name: Dungeon Mage [1.1.1.0-alpha]
description:
You were drained of all your magic power and are now entrapped in a dungeon. Find ressources, craft items and get stronger to fight the enemies lurking within. This game was created in 7 days .

Content

There are currently 3 enemies, 6 swords, 5 pickaxes and several consumable items. The map is kept small due to time constraints.

Recipes

Current Tool + Ingot = New Tool
Ore + Coal
Food + Coal
Item + Item
... some more

Controls

Left Click - Use item
WASD - Movement
Right Click - Interact with hovered object
Esc - Open game options

Discord

Here you can post your game progress saved in your clipboard, suggest content that should be included, report bugs and just talk in general! 
Join the discord

Changes in 1.1.1.0-alpha (26.01.2023) - Material that isn't a tool no longer shows 'Material/Material'
- 'Piece of Magic' now has a higher drop chance
- Magical Pickaxe and Magical Sword now shoot projectiles
- Smarter camera for widescreen
- Heal items drop less often, but heal more
- 'Sticky Sword' replaced by 'Goblin Heirloom'
- Added options setting to see DPS The windows-version has far better performance in comparison to the Web-Version. If you're experiencing issues playing on web, please try downloading the desktop-version. Credits
